about_the_game:
Build a versatile army and adapt it to your playstyle! In this physics-based real-time strategy game no one is safe from the war over the valuable resource Zenith.

  • Customize your army — Select from a variety of units and components for your army

  • Build your base and gather resources — Build key structures to put your strategic plan into action and harvest the fields of Zenith

  • Upgrade your units — Adapt to your enemy's forces by researching powerful upgrades

  • Take advantage of your arsenal — Hovercraft, mechs, air-based units and infantry (including cyborgs and robots) all take important roles in your strategic plan

  • Embrace real-world physics — Vehicles are pushed back by nearby explosions and can collide with each under extreme conditions

  • Singleplayer Campaign — Follow a gripping story with unexpected twists

  • Multiplayer Matchmaking — Find others to play with in quick match or the server browser

  • Skirmish — Train against AI

  • Level Editor — Easily create and share your own levels

It's the year 2049. The most powerful catalyst for human conflict is blanketing the earth's surface: Zenith. After the fall of the old world government Naos, two opposing factions known as the Phoenix and the Eclipse are struggling for world dominion in a new ice age. The Eclipse fight to establish a currupted order, not unlike the tyranny the fallen Naos had put in place before, while Phoenix is desperately keeping them at bay. Defeat the Eclipse, no matter what the cost!

Taking on the role of a young commander you lead your forces to fight the mysterious enemy. You are tasked to halt the advancing legions in their tracks to retake what was once ours.

Will you unveil the hidden face of this war?

content_descriptors.notes: Includes depictions of violence and fantasy military warfare.
